---
title: "Manage model inventory custom fields"
date: last-modified
---

Create and edit custom fields that appear in all models in the model inventory 

## Prerequisites

* You hold the `Customer Admin` role.

## Steps

1. [Log in to the ValidMind UI]({{< var vm_url >}}).

2. Click **Settings** on the left sidebar.

3. Click **Custom Fields** under **Workspace Settings**. Here you can edit existing custom fields, or add a new one.

4. To add a new field, click **+ Add new field**. To edit an existing field, select **Edit** under the **Actions** column for the desired field.

5. Edit the **Type**, **Name** and **Key** fields as desired. 

    -  If you want to create a template using rich text formatting, select **Long text** under **Type**.

    -  Toggle **Enable rich text formatting**.

    -  Create a template using the rich text editor. It will appear in all models in the Model Inventory.

    -  Within a model, you can [edit fields](edit-model-inventory-fields.qmd) to fill out the template you created.
